description: Be Mammut – every day: For hiking, climbing or everyday life. With the Core T-Shirt from the Logowear collection, you can show your passion for the outdoors wherever you go. The material feels pleasant and light to wear. The T-shirt dries faster thanks to the wicking finish in the polyester content which wicks moisture toward the outside. Available in five different prints. Can be combined with other items from the Mammut Logowear collection.
name: Mammut Mammut Core T-Shirt Tiles - Mens
